trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is thrown when an error occurs during event tracing for Windows (ETW).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx $XXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or null if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.
